data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Boa Vista, Cape Verde honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Boa Vista, Cape Verde
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 1,572 believers find a person of peace today among the 17,228 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Boa Vista, Cape Verde.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 18,800 people living in the state of Boa Vista.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Sal Rei
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Sal Rei, Boa Vista, Cape Verde.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Boa Vista to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 1,572 believers in Boa Vista, Cape Verde a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Boa Vista, Cape Verde has a population of 18,800.

We estimate Boa Vista has 1,572 people who might know Jesus, 14,587 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,641 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 11 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Boa Vista that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.
